TextView.android:text:
Welcome dear User!
 Instructions on using the app:

 To see contents,
 >>Click on a list.
 >>Click on 'View Data' to view the list contents.

 To add an item,
 >>Enter the item name
 >>Click on 'Add' to add it to the list.


To edit an item,
 >>Click on the item.
 >>Edit it
 >>Click on 'Save'
 

To delete an item,
 >>Click on the item
 >>Click on 'Delete'
